definition: system/to control/to regulate/variant of 製|制[zhi4]
to pass/to spend (time)/measure/limit/extent/degree of intensity/degree (angles, temperature etc)/kilowatt-hour/classifier for events and occurrences

sentences.english: Slavery was abolished in the United States after the Civil War.
sentences.chinese: 美国的奴隶制度自南北战争后就废除了。

sentences.english: At first, many of the townsmen were opposed to the abolition of slavery.
sentences.chinese: 起初，许多住在城里的人反对废除奴隶制度。

sentences.english: It was urged that slavery (should) be abolished.
sentences.chinese: 人们力言应废除奴隶制度。

sentences.english: Was he the first president to pass laws to stop slavery?
sentences.chinese: 他是第一个颁布法律废除奴隶制度的总统吗？

sentences.english: People who opposed slavery did not want it to spread.
sentences.chinese: 反对奴隶制度的人不希望黑奴制度扩散。

sentences.english: He passed laws against slavery and kept the United States united.
sentences.chinese: 他颁布法律反对奴隶制度，并使美国保持统一。

sentences.english: Southerners feared homesteaders would add their voices to the call to stop slavery.
sentences.chinese: 而南方人则担心开垦者会要求废除奴隶制度。

sentences.english: Many times have I wept in the land of my birth over the system of slavery.
sentences.chinese: 在故乡我曾多次为奴隶制度掩面哭泣。

sentences.english: His belief in freedom was the mainspring of his fight against slavery.
sentences.chinese: 他对自由的信仰是他对奴隶制度作斗争的动力。

sentences.english: Their discussion centred around the abolition of slavery.
sentences.chinese: 他们的讨论是以废除奴隶制度为中心而进行的。

sentences.english: He theorized that the underlying cause of the war was slavery.
sentences.chinese: 他从理论上阐明这次战争的根本原因在于奴隶制度。

sentences.english: His belief in liberty was the mainspring of his fight against slavery.
sentences.chinese: 他对自由的信仰是他反抗奴隶制度的主要动力。

sentences.english: But the echoes they awake will never rest until slavery itself is dead.
sentences.chinese: 但是回声永远不会停止，直到奴隶制度完全废除。

sentences.english: Militantly resentful of slavery, he joined the Union Army.
sentences.chinese: 由于对奴隶制度极为不满，他加入了联邦军队。

sentences.english: The Israelites escaped slavery in Egypt by walking on dry land.
sentences.chinese: 为了躲避埃及的奴隶制度，他们行走在干燥的陆地上。

definition: slave-owning society (precedes feudal society 封建社會|封建社会 in Marxist theory)
